definition: midnight/to order à la carte/(math.) zero of a function

zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
Ground Zero (refers to the site of the World Trade Center destroyed in 9-11-2001 attack)
Ground Zero (refers to the site of the World Trade Center destroyed in 9-11-2001 attack)

sentences.english: The current through the resistor is several thousandths of an ampere.
sentences.chinese: 该电阻上的电流为零点零零几安培。

sentences.english: Use the ZPE (zero point energy) , revise the whole energy.
sentences.chinese: 对于单点能采用零点能校正。

sentences.english: This risk is coverable at a premium of 0.25%.
sentences.chinese: 该险别的保险费是百分之零点二五。

sentences.english: She clocked 11.6 seconds for the 80-metres hurdles.
sentences.chinese: 她八十米跨栏用了十一秒零点六的时间。

sentences.english: The flow value was not zero during zero-point adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 做零点调整过程中，流速不为零。

sentences.english: But Amy appear some solitary zero point zero a person.
sentences.chinese: 唯独艾米显得有些孤零点零的一个人。

sentences.english: The problem of large zero drift always exists in microwave power meters with thermistor.
sentences.chinese: 热敏电阻式微波功率计，一直存在零点漂移大的问题。

sentences.english: And what you see is that at zero, you start at zero.
sentences.chinese: 你们看在零点处，它是零。

sentences.english: A type of capacitive microsensor whose null point and gain can be regulated is introduced here.
sentences.chinese: 文中介绍一种可调零点和增益的电容式微型传感器。

sentences.english: This is proof that Congress knows about zero-point energy.
sentences.chinese: 这是国会知道零点能源技术的证据。

sentences.english: We'll set the zero of energy there, be done with it.
sentences.chinese: 我们把能量零点选在这里，然后开始计算。

sentences.english: And by what the plan caused at 0 o'clock long swimming chain-reacting still won't end at this point.
sentences.chinese: 而由零点计划引发的久游的连锁反应还不会就此结束。

sentences.english: Zero-crossing algorithm is used to get the system frequency.
sentences.chinese: 频率的测量选用过零点检测法。

sentences.english: Output zero and output full calibration.
sentences.chinese: 输出零点和输出满度校正。

sentences.english: But the margin is razor-thin---it is only 0.2 percent.
sentences.chinese: 但是这次双方的差距非常小，只有百分之零点二。

sentences.english: Determination of transmission zeros is important in synthesis of cross-coupled filter.
sentences.chinese: 传输零点的确定是交叉耦合滤波器综合的最基本要素。

definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
to count backwards (from 10 down to 0)/to count down/from the bottom (lines on a page)/from the back (rows of seats)
very early in the morning/in the wee hours
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly
